name: 'In Desolate Times' CD + 2 FREE UNRELEASED SONGS*
description:
Re-release including 2 additional bonus tracks 'Insides Out' and 'We're All Just Acting'

Tracklisting:

1. Te'Lamon
2. We'll Never See Alaska
3. This Won't Mean A Thing, Love
4. So I Declare Transparency
5. Prometheus
6. The Great Divide
7. Away Beneath The Skyline
8. Guess I'll Just Keep Saving Myself
9. Insides Out
10. We're All Just Acting

*Every order will also receive FREE mp3s of unreleased tracks 'The Sleepless Crusade' and 'Raise A Glass To Burn The Past'
